sect1.title: Trinity/KDE3 Pre-installation Configuration
sect1.para: Based on your preference, set TRINITY_PREFIX.
One option is to put Trinity/KDE3 into the /usr hierarchy. This creates a simpler setup but is more difficult to try multiple versions of Trinity/KDE3.
The Trinty developers and BLFS editors recommend installing Trinity in the /opt directory in order to support using one version while building another.
Using this option requires updates to the PATH, PKG_CONFIG_PATH, and library search path:
The instructions for making these changes permanent are in .
